movies.title: House of Cards
movies.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

movies.title: Orange is the New Black
movies.description: Convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting drug money, a woman enters a federal prison.

movies.title: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
movies.description: A woman is rescued from a doomsday cult and starts life over again in New York City.

movies.title: Stranger Things
movies.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces.

movies.title: The Crown
movies.description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

movies.title: Black Mirror
movies.description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech world where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.
